title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the country that is the SECOND least corrupt.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a similarity or difference for Russia and Nigeria in terms of the Human Development Index (HDI) score or Corruption Perceptions Index (CPI) score based on the data in the graph.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe one component of the Human Development Index.

For Task D, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about how perceived corruption relates to HDI using the data in the graph and the examiner’s knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics

For Task E, the response must correctly explain how the United Kingdom’s regime type is related to the CPI score.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
